title: How to Mute a Chat on WhatsApp

steps.title: Tap the "Chats" tab.
steps.content: Tap the "Chats" tab. This is in the toolbar at the bottom of your screen; you may have to tap the backward-facing arrow in the top left corner of your screen to view this toolbar.

steps.title: Swipe left on the chat you wish to mute.
steps.content: Swipe left on the chat you wish to mute. You should see two options--"More" and "Archive"--appear on the right side of the screen.

steps.title: Tap a mute time frame.
steps.content: Tap a mute time frame. You can choose "8 hours", "1 week", or "1 year". You have successfully muted a chat on WhatsApp! To unmute the conversation manually, tap Mute again and then tap Unmute .
